reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that the app collects and processes data of users for various purposes and provides detailed information regarding the collection and processing of personal data.
reply.reference: When using our games and/or apps, we collect certain information about you. You can find more details regarding this further down in this section of the Privacy Policy. URL: http://www.peaksel.com/privacy-policy-for-free-apps/

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects data related to the use of the game, mobile operating system, mobile internet browsers, country and region, language settings, advertising ID, interactions with ads, app and game usage data, information on in-app purchases, technical problems, etc.

content: Information on app and game usage

reply.analysis: The app collects a variety of data related to game usage, device information, interactions with ads, and in-app purchases to enhance user experience and monitor performance.
reply.reference: The app collects data related to the use of the game (progress in the game, level achieved, time spent in game, in-game purchases), your mobile operating system, the type of mobile Internet browsers you use, the country and region from which you access our products and services, what language your device is in, advertising ID number, data about interactions with ads as well as information on how you use apps and games (such as data about which apps and games you use, game progress, duration of play, purchases made within the app or game, whether there were technical problems in the functioning of the same, etc.). URL: http://www.peaksel.com/privacy-policy-for-free-apps/

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app informs users about the purposes for which data is collected and used.
reply.reference: We would like to point out that even if you decide to turn off displaying interest based ads, that is if you do not want your data to be collected and processed for the stated purpose, you will still be able to use our apps and games without interruption. However, please note that you will still see ads within apps and games, however these ads will not be displayed based on your inferred interest determined by the collection and processing of your personal data. URL: http://www.peaksel.com/privacy-policy-for-free-apps/

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection by turning off the possibility in the Privacy Policy section of the app. Additionally, the user can delete their account within the app, which will remove all collected personal data including email address from the systems.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that users have the option to opt out of data collection by turning off the possibility and also to delete their account, resulting in the removal of all personal data.
reply.reference: If you do not agree to your data being used for the stated purposes, it is necessary to turn off this possibility (opt out) in the manner specified in this section of the Privacy Policy. Account Deletion: You have the option to delete your account within the app. Upon account deletion, we will remove all collected personal data, including your email address, from our systems. URL: http://www.peaksel.com/privacy-policy-for-free-apps/

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares data with third parties.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that the app cooperates with third parties who are marketing and advertising partners and may share collected data with them for advertising purposes.
reply.reference: We cooperate with third parties who are our marketing and advertising partners and who, through various tools, provide us with the necessary assistance for displaying such ads, and we may share with them the data we have collected about you in order to achieve the aforementioned purpose. URL: http://www.peaksel.com/privacy-policy-for-free-apps/

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with marketing and advertising partners who assist in displaying ads and promoting products and services based on user interests.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions that the app cooperates with marketing and advertising partners who provide assistance in displaying ads and promoting products and services based on user interests, sharing collected data with them for these purposes.
reply.reference: We cooperate with third parties who are our marketing and advertising partners and who, through various tools, provide us with the necessary assistance for displaying such ads, and we may share with them the data we have collected about you in order to achieve the aforementioned purpose. URL: http://www.peaksel.com/privacy-policy-for-free-apps/
